article_title: Norman hospital board gets lofty view from Innovation Tower
article_text:
Norman, OK (73070)

Today

Gusty winds with scattered afternoon thunderstorms. A few storms may be severe. High 83F. Winds S at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 40%..

Tonight

Scattered thunderstorms in the evening. Cloudy skies overnight. A few storms may be severe. Low near 65F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

article_metadata.news_keywords: government, news, local_news, community, oklahoma, business
article_metadata.author: Joy Hampton Senior Staff Writer

og.description: The Norman Regional Hospital Authority took to the skies Monday evening, choosing to meet on the eighth floor of the HealthPlex. The meeting in the lofty Innovation Tower allowed board
